rules.name: ProgramType_and_Partner_Type_Match_the_Partner
rules.label: ProgramType and Partner Type Match the Partner

Flow.description: 02-08-23 : GTMS-14415 : Mapping values to Teaming_Partner_Account__c field. 29-08-23 : GTMS - 14415 - Removed Teaming partner text field from account 17-01-25: GTMS-25904: Updated mapping of partner fields for Safety Program Sales program type

formulas.name: InsurencePartnerCustom

formulas.description: GTMS-14415 : Creating this formula to map value to teaming partner account field
formulas.name: Teaming_Partner_Account_Id
formulas.expression: IF( OR( {!ProgramTypeValue}="Teaming", {!ProgramTypeValue}="Teaming Partner" ), {!thisPartnerSFDC.Id}, IF( {!ProgramTypeValue} == "Safety Program", IF( AND( NOT(ISNULL({!thisOpportunity.Insurance_Partner__c})), NOT(ISBLANK({!thisOpportunity.Insurance_Partner__c})) ), {!thisPartnerSFDC.Id}, NULL ), NULL ) )

formulas.name: TeamingPartner
formulas.expression: IF( OR( {!ProgramTypeValue}="Teaming", {!ProgramTypeValue}="Teaming Partner" ), {!thisPartnerSFDC.Name}, IF( {!ProgramTypeValue} == "Safety Program", IF( AND( NOT(ISNULL({!thisOpportunity.Insurance_Partner__c})), NOT(ISBLANK({!thisOpportunity.Insurance_Partner__c})) ), {!thisPartnerSFDC.Name}, NULL ), NULL ) )

Flow.label: Tag Partner Influenced Opportunity

fields.name: message
fields.fieldText: Average SLA is 3 days for the approval. If its beyond 3 days, please reach out to #insurance-partners Slack channel

fields.name: Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Are you actively working with a Samsara partner on this opportunity (e.g. Reseller or Insurance partner)?


Click next for instructions to tag the channel partner to the opportunity.

fields.name: Certify
fields.fieldText: By proceeding you certify that the channel partner is playing an instrumental role in influencing the end customer's purchasing decision on this opportunity.

fields.name: CouldntFind
fields.fieldText: I couldn't find that partner in Salesforce or the partner isn't authorized to work with us yet. Try searching again with the partner's name as listed in Salesforce. Still running into issues - reach out to bit.ly/samsarasalesops

fields.name: PartnerName
fields.fieldText: What is the partner organization's name?

fields.name: Success
fields.fieldText: Success! The channel partner is now tagged to your opportunity.

fields.name: Choose_the_correct_fleet_insurance_0
fields.fieldText: Choose the correct fleet insurance partner:

fields.name: CantFind_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: Not seeing the partner you wanted? Click previous and search with the partner's name as listed in Salesforce.

fields.name: ProgramTypeMismatchText
fields.fieldText: You have selected a program type that is not supported by the partner. Please go back and update. Thanks!

fields.name: ProgramTypeDisplayText_2_0
fields.fieldText:
The partner you have selected supports the following program types.

Partner Team Alignment : {!thisPartnerSFDC.Partner_Type__c}

Sales Program Type : {!thisPartnerSFDC.Program_Type__c}


Please select the program type that the partner supports for this opportunity

fields.name: DisplayMessage
fields.fieldText: A channel relationship for this partner account and program type already exists on this opportunity - please review those relationships and reach out to #help-sales if you have any concerns or want to request changes you cant make directly

fields.name: Salesprogramtypemessage
fields.fieldText:
All efforts to add Paid Referrals to open opportunities are currently subject to Programs review and approval. Please use the Manual Referral Payout (Rebate) process to request a Paid Referral partner is added to this deal.


Thanks for your patience and support while we enhance our Partner Program frameworks!


Samsara Partner Programs Team
